SELECT T.ITEM_NO, T.ITEM_ID, concat('STA_ITEM.',T.ITEM_ID) AS ITEM_ID_F, IF(#language#='en', T.ITEM_EN_NAME, T.ITEM_NAME) ITEM_NAME_F, IF(#language#='en', T.ITEM_EN_NAME, T.ITEM_NAME) ITEM_NAME, T.ITEM_EN_NAME, T.UNIT UNIT_CODE, IF(#language#='en', SY3.CODE_EN_NAME, SY3.CODE_NAME) UNIT_NAME, T.MIN_UNIT, T.CALCU_ORDER, (SELECT COUNT(T.CALCU_ORDER) FROM AR_STA_ITEM T) MAX_INDEX, T.DATATYPE DATA_TYPE_CODE, IF(#language#='en', SY2.CODE_EN_NAME, SY2.CODE_NAME) DATA_TYPE_NAME, T.CPNY_ID, IF(#language#='en', A.CPNY_EN_NAME, A.CPNY_NAME) CPNY_NAME, T.ACTIVITY STATUS_ID, IF(T.ACTIVITY='1', IF(#language#='en', 'Available', '可用'), IF(#language#='en', 'Unavailable', '不可用')) STATUS FROM AR_STA_ITEM T LEFT JOIN SY_CODE SY2 ON T.DATATYPE = SY2.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SY_CODE SY3 ON T.UNIT = SY3.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN HR_COMPANY A ON T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID
T.ITEM_NAME LIKE contact('%',TRIM(#keyWord:VARCHAR#),'%') OR T.ITEM_EN_NAME LIKE contact('%',TRIM(#keyWord:VARCHAR#),'%')
T.ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.ITEM_NO = #ITEM_NO#
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY T.CALCU_ORDER

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AR_STA_ITEM T LEFT JOIN SY_CODE SY2 ON T.DATATYPE = SY2.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SY_CODE SY3 ON T.UNIT = SY3.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN HR_COMPANY A ON T.CPNY_ID = A.CPNY_ID
T.ITEM_NAME LIKE contact('%',TRIM(#keyWord:VARCHAR#),'%') OR T.ITEM_EN_NAME LIKE contact('%',TRIM(#keyWord:VARCHAR#),'%')
T.ACTIVITY = #ACTIVITY#
T.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
T.ITEM_NO = #ITEM_NO:NUMERIC#
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AR_STA_FORMULAR WHERE ITEM_NO = #ITEM_NO#) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_TAB_COLS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'AR_HISTORY' AND COLUMN_NAME = #ITEM_ID#) AS A FROM DUAL
